MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY7 and KY8 postcode areas of Glenrothes and Leven.Following a number of recent power interruptions, caused by bird strikes to our 11,000-volt overhead lines near Carriston Reservoir, our engineers need to switch off the power from 9:00am till 3:30pm to safely install new protection devices near Auchenblae and Mildeans Farm and bird flight diverters to our overhead line. This will minimise the number of customers affected by future bird strikes. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:01am on Tuesday, 12 January 2021
